name: ai-options-trading
description: AI-powered options trading system with real-time dashboard

scripts.dev:services: echo 'Starting all backend services...' && concurrently --prefix '[{name}]' --names 'data,tech,ml,strategy,risk,options' 'cd services/data-acquisition && python main.py' 'cd services/technical-analysis && python main.py' 'cd services/ml-service && python main.py' 'cd services/strategy-engine && python main.py' 'cd services/risk-management && python main.py' 'cd services/options-analytics && python main.py'
scripts.test:all: npm run test:services && npm run test:dashboard
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: Your Name
